requirements.description: Compliance with all applicable privacy laws is required
Information collection from End User's device or browser by OneSignal can only be done if Licensee obtains all applicable consents
Licensee must publish privacy policies and disclosures for the Properties that comply with applicable law and the terms of this EULA
The privacy policies must clearly disclose that the SDK Information will be collected and specify its usage as set forth in Section 5

type.summary: Clear Disclosure of Data Collection and Usage
